channel.title: Buy-regions on Field Expedient SDR
channel.description: Recent content in Buy-regions on Field Expedient SDR

item.title: Buy The Books
item.description: All volumes of the Field Expedient SDR series are available on [Amazon Australia] (http://www.amazon.com.au) in the Kindle format. We apologize for our inability to serve this market with a paperback format but hope you will enjoy the full-color ebook. Volume 1 Volume 2 Volume 3 [Kindle (full color)] (http://www.amazon.com.au/dp/B01M15DO0S) [Kindle (full color)] (http://www.amazon.com.au/dp/B01LXKJRSA) [Kindle (full color)] (http://www.amazon.com.au/dp/B01M15ECBR) The links above are for purchase in Australia.

item.title: Buy The Books
item.description: All volumes of the Field Expedient SDR series are available on [Amazon Canada] (http://www.amazon.ca) in paperback and Kindle formats. The paperbacks are available with a black and white interior as well as a full-color interior. Because the gnuradio interface color-codes some of its elements, there is additional value in the color versions. Unfortunately, the printing costs of full-color books are much more expensive, so we’ve also provided the more affordable black-and-white versions.
